mapper.select: SELECT m.id FROM role_menu rm LEFT JOIN menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.id WHERE rm.role_id = #{id} AND m.`status` = '0' AND m.`del_flag` = '0' ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.order_num

SELECT m.perms FROM user_role ur LEFT JOIN role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN menu m ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE ur.`user_id` = #{id} AND m.`status` = '0' AND m.`menu_type` IN ('F') AND m.`del_flag` = '0'
